Text.val: 18.11.2014 SH SCR19335 Added step 5 Save the utilized balance of the deposit client
05.12.2013 SH SCR18571 Added step 4 Save the balance of the deposit client
2. Update the existing or created SCPD row

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :2 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':4' and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 for fetch only
select cast(sum (SCPD_INVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SCPD where SCPD_DATE = ':2' and SCPD_TYPE = 3 and SCPD_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and SCPD_SCFP_NO = :4 for fetch only
